# Rootly Notes

> Your learning journey tracker - A modern web application for tracking courses, notes, and daily study progress.

## About

Rootly Notes is a personal learning management system designed to help students and lifelong learners track their educational journey. It combines course management, note-taking with Q&A format, daily study tracking with mood logging, and visual analytics.

## Key Features

- **Course Management**: Organize courses with instructors, topics, and resource links
- **Smart Notes**: Q&A format notes with code snippets, syntax highlighting, and understanding levels (1-5)
- **Daily Tracking**: Log study time and mood to monitor learning patterns
- **Visual Analytics**: Charts showing study time, mood trends, understanding progress
- **Review Mode**: Spaced repetition review system for flagged notes
- **Cloud Sync**: Optional Supabase authentication for cross-device sync
- **Offline First**: Full localStorage support for privacy-focused users
